alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 10:42AM MST until January 21 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Light snow. Snowfall amounts of 4 to 7 inches have already occurred. Additional accumulations up to 2 inches expected. Additional snowfall up to 3 inches expected for Casper Mountain. * WHERE...The I-25 Corridor, from 20 Mile Hill to the Converse Co. line. Casper Mountain included. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. This includes Interstate 25, and other highways across the county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
